"Waker":
"Waker is a class that summons Familiars to fight alongside them.

These versatile Familiars allow them to quickly adapt to the situation."

"\"Fredran\" and \"Wulfer\" are Familiars mainly summoned via Photon Arts.

Fredran is a pterosaur-type Familiar and specializes in long-range breath attacks.

Wulfer is a therianthrope Familiar and specializes in heavy melee attacks."

"\"Marmelo\" is an adorable-looking Familiar mainly summoned via Weapon Action.

It specializes in defending against enemy attacks, and is capable of carrying out its own devastating counterattack."
